info.title: Moon Banking API
info.description:
# Welcome to the Moon Banking API!

Enjoy the documentation and happy coding. Share this spec with your LLM of choice to speed up your development, or take a look at our MCP server and various SDKs.

### More information

For more information about the Moon Banking API, please visit the [Moon Banking Documentation](https://docs.moonbanking.com).

get.description: This endpoint allows you to retrieve banks by hostname. It will return up to one bank per country that matches the provided hostname. The hostname is normalized (www. prefix removed if present) and matched against both the primary hostname and alternative hostnames.

parameters.name: hostname

schema.description: The hostname to search for (e.g., "fidelity.com" or "www.fidelity.com").

parameters.description: The hostname to search for (e.g., "fidelity.com" or "www.fidelity.com").

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: An optional  comma-separated list of fields to include in the response. Possible values: `scores`, `country`

parameters.name: pageTitle

schema.description: The title of the web page.

parameters.description: The title of the web page.

name.description: The bank's official name or display name.

rank.description: The bank's worldwide rank. Based on the bank's overall score, which is determined by user votes across all categories. Only banks with at least 10 votes are ranked.

countryRank.description: The bank's rank within the country. Based on the bank's overall score, which is determined by user votes across all categories. Only banks with at least 10 votes are ranked.

description.description: The bank's description in Markdown (md) format.
description.example:
# Fidelity

Fidelity is a financial institution that provides banksing and investment services to individuals.

storiesCount.description: The number of stories for this bank.

scores.description: Vote totals and scores for this bank across all categories. All votes are cast by users.

overall.description: Aggregate voting counts and score for this bank across all voting categories.

total.description: The total number of votes for this bank. This is the sum of upvotes and downvotes across all categories.

up.description: The total number of upvotes for this bank. This is the sum of upvotes across all categories.

down.description: The total number of downvotes for this bank. This is the sum of downvotes across all categories.

score.description: The overall score for this bank across all categories, ranging from -100 to 100.

cryptoFriendly.description: Aggregate voting counts and score for crypto-friendliness category for this bank.

total.description: The total number of votes for crypto-friendliness for this bank.

up.description: The total number of upvotes for crypto-friendliness for this bank.

down.description: The total number of downvotes for crypto-friendliness for this bank.

score.description: The score for the crypto-friendliness category, ranging from -100 to 100.

customerService.description: Aggregate voting counts and score for customer service category for this bank.

total.description: The total number of votes for customer service for this bank.

up.description: The total number of upvotes for customer service for this bank.

down.description: The total number of downvotes for customer service for this bank.

score.description: The score for the customer service category, ranging from -100 to 100.

feesPricing.description: Aggregate voting counts and score for fees & pricing category for this bank.

total.description: The total number of votes for fees & pricing for this bank.

up.description: The total number of upvotes for fees & pricing for this bank.

down.description: The total number of downvotes for fees & pricing for this bank.

score.description: The score for the fees & pricing category, ranging from -100 to 100.

digitalExperience.description: Aggregate voting counts and score for digital experience category for this bank.

total.description: The total number of votes for digital experience for this bank.

up.description: The total number of upvotes for digital experience for this bank.

down.description: The total number of downvotes for digital experience for this bank.

score.description: The score for the digital experience category, ranging from -100 to 100.

securityTrust.description: Aggregate voting counts and score for security & trust category for this bank.

total.description: The total number of votes for security & trust for this bank.

up.description: The total number of upvotes for security & trust for this bank.

down.description: The total number of downvotes for security & trust for this bank.

score.description: The score for the security & trust category, ranging from -100 to 100.

accountFeatures.description: Aggregate voting counts and score for account features category for this bank.

total.description: The total number of votes for account features for this bank.

up.description: The total number of upvotes for account features for this bank.

down.description: The total number of downvotes for account features for this bank.

score.description: The score for the account features category, ranging from -100 to 100.

branchAtmAccess.description: Aggregate voting counts and score for branch & ATM access category for this bank.

total.description: The total number of votes for branch & ATM access for this bank.

up.description: The total number of upvotes for branch & ATM access for this bank.

down.description: The total number of downvotes for branch & ATM access for this bank.

score.description: The score for the branch & ATM access category, ranging from -100 to 100.

internationalBanking.description: Aggregate voting counts and score for international banking category for this bank.

total.description: The total number of votes for international banking for this bank.

up.description: The total number of upvotes for international banking for this bank.

down.description: The total number of downvotes for international banking for this bank.

up.description: The total number of upvotes for business banking for this bank.

down.description: The total number of downvotes for business banking for this bank.

total.description: The total number of votes for processing speed for this bank.

get.description: This endpoint allows you to retrieve a paginated list of all banks. By default, a maximum of ten banks are shown per page. You can search banks by name, filter by country, sort them by various fields, and include related data like scores and country information.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items to return.

parameters.name: starting_after
parameters.description: Cursor for forward pagination. Use the id of the last item from the previous page to get the next page.

parameters.name: ending_before
parameters.description: Cursor for backward pagination. Use the id of the first item from the current page to get the previous page.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search banks by name.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Field to sort by.

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: Sort order. Either ascending or descending.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: An optional  comma-separated list of fields to include in the response. Possible values: `scores`, `country`, `meta`

parameters.name: countryId
parameters.description: Only return banks in the specified country. A country's ID is Moon Banking's unique identifier for the country.

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: Only return banks in the specified country. A country's code is the ISO 3166-1 code for the country. If both `countryId` and `countryCode` are provided, `countryId` will be used.

name.description: The bank's official name or display name.

rank.description: The bank's worldwide rank. Based on the bank's overall score, which is determined by user votes across all categories. Only banks with at least 10 votes are ranked.

countryRank.description: The bank's rank within the country. Based on the bank's overall score, which is determined by user votes across all categories. Only banks with at least 10 votes are ranked.

description.description: The bank's description in Markdown (md) format.

Fidelity is a financial institution that provides banksing and investment services to individuals.

get.description: This endpoint allows you to retrieve a specific bank by providing the bank ID. You can include related data like scores and country information in the response.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The bank's auto-generated unique identifier.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: An optional  comma-separated list of fields to include in the response. Possible values: `scores`, `country`

name.description: The bank's official name or display name.

rank.description: The bank's worldwide rank. Based on the bank's overall score, which is determined by user votes across all categories. Only banks with at least 10 votes are ranked.

countryRank.description: The bank's rank within the country. Based on the bank's overall score, which is determined by user votes across all categories. Only banks with at least 10 votes are ranked.

description.description: The bank's description in Markdown (md) format.

get.description: This endpoint allows you to retrieve a paginated list of bank votes. You can filter by bank ID, category, country, vote type (upvote or downvote), and other parameters.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items to return.

parameters.name: starting_after
parameters.description: Cursor for forward pagination. Use the id of the last item from the previous page to get the next page.

parameters.name: ending_before
parameters.description: Cursor for backward pagination. Use the id of the first item from the current page to get the previous page.

parameters.name: bankId
parameters.description: The bank's auto-generated unique identifier.

parameters.name: categories
parameters.description: An optional  comma-separated list of fields to include in the response. Possible values: `CRYPTO_FRIENDLY`, `CUSTOMER_SERVICE`, `FEES_PRICING`, `DIGITAL_EXPERIENCE`, `SECURITY_TRUST`, `ACCOUNT_FEATURES`, `BRANCH_ATM_ACCESS`, `INTERNATIONAL_BANKING`, `BUSINESS_BANKING`, `PROCESSING_SPEED`, `TRANSPARENCY`, `INNOVATION`, `INVESTMENT_SERVICES`, `LENDING`

parameters.name: isUp
parameters.description: Whether to filter for upvotes (true) or downvotes (false).

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: The country's ISO 3166-1 code (2 characters).

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Field to sort by.

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: Sort order. Either ascending or descending.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: An optional  comma-separated list of fields to include in the response. Possible values: `bank`, `country`

isUp.description: Whether this is an upvote (`true`) or downvote (`false`).

category.description: The category in which the vote was cast.

bankId.description: The ID of the bank for which the vote was cast.

createdAt.description: The date and time the vote was created in Moon Banking.

updatedAt.description: The date and time the vote was last updated in Moon Banking.

bank.description: The bank for which the vote was cast.

name.description: The bank's official name or display name.

countryId.description: The ID of the country where this bank is located.

country.description: The country in which the bank is located.

name.description: The country's official name. Must be unique across all countries.

items.description: The bank vote model contains voting information for banks, including the vote direction. When fetching votes, the related bank and/or country data may optionally be included in the response.

hasMore.description: Whether there are more items available

nextCursor.description: Cursor for the next page. Use this as the starting_after parameter for the next request. Null if no more pages.

previousCursor.description: Cursor for the previous page. Use this as the ending_before parameter for the previous request. Null if no previous pages.

meta.description: If meta is included in the include parameter, the meta object will be included in the response.

total.description: Total count of all items that match the query parameters

issues.description: An array of issues that were responsible for the error
An array of issues that were responsible for the error
An array of issues that were responsible for the error
An array of issues that were responsible for the error
An array of issues that were responsible for the error

get.description: This endpoint allows you to retrieve a paginated list of all countries. By default, a maximum of ten countries are shown per page. You can search countries by name or 2-letter code, sort them by various fields, and include related data like scores.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items to return.

parameters.name: starting_after
parameters.description: Cursor for forward pagination. Use the id of the last item from the previous page to get the next page.

parameters.name: ending_before
parameters.description: Cursor for backward pagination. Use the id of the first item from the current page to get the previous page.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search countries by name or 2-letter code.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Field to sort by.

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: Sort order. Either ascending or descending.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: An optional  comma-separated list of fields to include in the response. Possible values: `scores`

name.description: The country's official name. Must be unique across all countries.

rank.description: The country's worldwide rank. Based on the country's overall score, which is determined by user votes across all categories for all banks in the country. Only countries with at least 25 votes are ranked.

banksCount.description: The number of banks in the country.

storiesCount.description: The number of stories for the country.

scores.description: Vote totals and scores for this bank across all categories. All votes are cast by users.

overall.description: Aggregate voting counts and score for all banks in the country across all voting categories.

total.description: The total number of votes for banks in the country. This is the sum of upvotes and downvotes across all categories and all banks in the country.

up.description: The total number of upvotes for banks in the country. This is the sum of upvotes across all categories.

down.description: The total number of downvotes for banks in the country. This is the sum of downvotes across all categories.

score.description: The overall score for banks in the country across all categories, ranging from -100 to 100. Based on upvotes and downvotes across all categories and all banks in the country.

cryptoFriendly.description: Aggregate voting counts and score for crypto-friendliness category for all banks in the country.

total.description: The total number of votes for crypto-friendliness for banks in the country.

up.description: The total number of upvotes for crypto-friendliness for banks in the country.

down.description: The total number of downvotes for crypto-friendliness for banks in the country.

score.description: The score for the crypto-friendliness category, ranging from -100 to 100.

get.description: This endpoint allows you to retrieve a specific country by providing the 2-letter ISO country code. You can include related data like scores in the response.

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: The country's ISO 3166-1 code (2 characters).

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: An optional  comma-separated list of fields to include in the response. Possible values: `scores`

name.description: The country's official name. Must be unique across all countries.

rank.description: The country's worldwide rank. Based on the country's overall score, which is determined by user votes across all categories for all banks in the country. Only countries with at least 25 votes are ranked.

banksCount.description: The number of banks in the country.

storiesCount.description: The number of stories for the country.

scores.description: Vote totals and scores for this bank across all categories. All votes are cast by users.

overall.description: Aggregate voting counts and score for all banks in the country across all voting categories.

total.description: The total number of votes for banks in the country. This is the sum of upvotes and downvotes across all categories and all banks in the country.

up.description: The total number of upvotes for banks in the country. This is the sum of upvotes across all categories.

down.description: The total number of downvotes for banks in the country. This is the sum of downvotes across all categories.

score.description: The overall score for banks in the country across all categories, ranging from -100 to 100. Based on upvotes and downvotes across all categories and all banks in the country.

cryptoFriendly.description: Aggregate voting counts and score for crypto-friendliness category for all banks in the country.

get.description: This endpoint allows you to retrieve a paginated list of all stories. By default, a maximum of ten stories are shown per page. You can search stories by text content, filter by bank ID, sort them by various fields, and include related data like bank and country information.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items to return.

parameters.name: starting_after
parameters.description: Cursor for forward pagination. Use the id of the last item from the previous page to get the next page.

parameters.name: ending_before
parameters.description: Cursor for backward pagination. Use the id of the first item from the current page to get the previous page.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search stories by text content.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Field to sort by.

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: Sort order. Either ascending or descending.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: An optional  comma-separated list of fields to include in the response. Possible values: `bank`, `country`

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: The country's ISO 3166-1 code (2 characters).

parameters.name: bankId
parameters.description: The bank's auto-generated unique identifier.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: An optional  comma-separated list of fields to include in the response. Possible values: `CRYPTO_FRIENDLY`, `CUSTOMER_SERVICE`, `FEES_PRICING`, `DIGITAL_EXPERIENCE`, `SECURITY_TRUST`, `ACCOUNT_FEATURES`, `BRANCH_ATM_ACCESS`, `INTERNATIONAL_BANKING`, `BUSINESS_BANKING`, `PROCESSING_SPEED`, `TRANSPARENCY`, `INNOVATION`, `INVESTMENT_SERVICES`, `LENDING`

text.description: The story content submitted by the user.
text.example: I had a great experience with this bank's customer service.

tags.description: An array of tags associated with this story for categorization and filtering. Possible tags are `CRYPTO_FRIENDLY`, `FEES_PRICING`, `DIGITAL_EXPERIENCE`, `ACCOUNT_FEATURES`, `CUSTOMER_SERVICE`, `SECURITY_TRUST`, `BRANCH_ATM_ACCESS`, `INTERNATIONAL_BANKING`, `BUSINESS_BANKING`, `PROCESSING_SPEED`, `TRANSPARENCY`, `INNOVATION`, `INVESTMENT_SERVICES` and `LENDING`.

bankId.description: The ID of the bank this story is about.

createdAt.description: The date and time the story was created in Moon Banking.

updatedAt.description: The date and time the story was last updated in Moon Banking.

thumbsUpCount.description: The number of thumbs up votes for this story.

bank.description: The bank about which the story was written.

name.description: The bank's official name or display name.

countryId.description: The ID of the country where this bank is located.

country.description: The country of the bank about which the story was written.

name.description: The country's official name. Must be unique across all countries.

items.description: The story model contains user-generated content about banks, as well as information about the bank and country in which the bank is located.

hasMore.description: Whether there are more items available

nextCursor.description: Cursor for the next page. Use this as the starting_after parameter for the next request. Null if no more pages.

previousCursor.description: Cursor for the previous page. Use this as the ending_before parameter for the previous request. Null if no previous pages.

meta.description: If meta is included in the include parameter, the meta object will be included in the response.

total.description: Total count of all items that match the query parameters

issues.description: An array of issues that were responsible for the error

get.description: This endpoint allows you to retrieve global overview data that aggregates banks votes, stories and other data across all banks in all countries. You can include related data like scores in the response.

parameters.description: An optional  comma-separated list of fields to include in the response. Possible values: `scores`

score.description: The overall score across all banks in all countries across all categories, ranging from -100 to 100. Based on upvotes and downvotes across all categories and all banks globally.

get.description: Search across banks, countries, and stories. You can specify which entities to search using the include parameter. If no include value is provided, all entities will be searched.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Search query string.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: An optional  comma-separated list of fields to include in the response. Possible values: `banks`, `countries`, `stories`

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return per entity type.

name.description: The bank's official name or display name.

rank.description: The bank's worldwide rank. Based on the bank's overall score, which is determined by user votes across all categories. Only banks with at least 10 votes are ranked.

countryRank.description: The bank's rank within the country. Based on the bank's overall score, which is determined by user votes across all categories. Only banks with at least 10 votes are ranked.

description.description: The bank's description in Markdown (md) format.
description.example:
# Fidelity

Fidelity is a financial institution that provides banksing and investment services to individuals.

up.description: The total number of upvotes for customer service for this bank.

down.description: The total number of downvotes for customer service for this bank.

score.description: The score for the customer service category, ranging from -100 to 100.

feesPricing.description: Aggregate voting counts and score for fees & pricing category for this bank.

total.description: The total number of votes for fees & pricing for this bank.

up.description: The total number of upvotes for fees & pricing for this bank.

down.description: The total number of downvotes for fees & pricing for this bank.

score.description: The score for the fees & pricing category, ranging from -100 to 100.

createdAt.description: The date and time the bank was created in Moon Banking.

updatedAt.description: The date and time the bank was last updated in Moon Banking.

country.description: The country where the bank is located.

name.description: The country's official name. Must be unique across all countries.

items.description: The bank model contains information about financial institutions.

banks.description: Array of search results for banks.

name.description: The country's official name. Must be unique across all countries.

rank.description: The country's worldwide rank. Based on the country's overall score, which is determined by user votes across all categories for all banks in the country. Only countries with at least 25 votes are ranked.

banksCount.description: The number of banks in the country.

storiesCount.description: The number of stories for the country.

scores.description: Vote totals and scores for this bank across all categories. All votes are cast by users.

overall.description: Aggregate voting counts and score for all banks in the country across all voting categories.

total.description: The total number of votes for banks in the country. This is the sum of upvotes and downvotes across all categories and all banks in the country.

up.description: The total number of upvotes for banks in the country. This is the sum of upvotes across all categories.

down.description: The total number of downvotes for banks in the country. This is the sum of downvotes across all categories.

score.description: The overall score for banks in the country across all categories, ranging from -100 to 100. Based on upvotes and downvotes across all categories and all banks in the country.

cryptoFriendly.description: Aggregate voting counts and score for crypto-friendliness category for all banks in the country.

total.description: The total number of votes for crypto-friendliness for banks in the country.

up.description: The total number of upvotes for crypto-friendliness for banks in the country.

down.description: The total number of downvotes for crypto-friendliness for banks in the country.

score.description: The score for the crypto-friendliness category, ranging from -100 to 100.

down.description: The total number of downvotes for customer service for banks in the country.

score.description: The score for the customer service category, ranging from -100 to 100.

text.description: The story content submitted by the user.
text.example: I had a great experience with this bank's customer service.

tags.description: An array of tags associated with this story for categorization and filtering. Possible tags are `CRYPTO_FRIENDLY`, `FEES_PRICING`, `DIGITAL_EXPERIENCE`, `ACCOUNT_FEATURES`, `CUSTOMER_SERVICE`, `SECURITY_TRUST`, `BRANCH_ATM_ACCESS`, `INTERNATIONAL_BANKING`, `BUSINESS_BANKING`, `PROCESSING_SPEED`, `TRANSPARENCY`, `INNOVATION`, `INVESTMENT_SERVICES` and `LENDING`.

bankId.description: The ID of the bank this story is about.

createdAt.description: The date and time the story was created in Moon Banking.

updatedAt.description: The date and time the story was last updated in Moon Banking.

thumbsUpCount.description: The number of thumbs up votes for this story.

bank.description: The bank about which the story was written.

name.description: The bank's official name or display name.

countryId.description: The ID of the country where this bank is located.

country.description: The country of the bank about which the story was written.

name.description: The country's official name. Must be unique across all countries.

items.description: The story model contains user-generated content about banks, as well as information about the bank and country in which the bank is located.

stories.description: Array of search results for stories.

data.description: The results of a search across banks, countries, and stories.
